name: Found It! Hidden Object Game
description:
Found It! - A fascinating game in the genre of Hidden Objects. Move around the interactive map, find items, complete quests and discover new colorful locations.

But don't think it's that easy! You have to interact with objects, solve puzzles and be very attentive!

Game Features:

Your goal is simple - look for and collect hidden objects on the map, complete tasks and open new amazing locations!
To find some items be prepared to be clever - interact with items to solve puzzles and find the right item!
Can't see the object? No problem - zoom in and slide your finger across the map to see all the hidden objects.
If you're having trouble, use the hints.
Develop your concentration and attention skills.

Ready to challenge us and find all the hidden objects? Then go ahead and search!
